sentences.en: Affairs do have a devastating effect on marriages.
sentences.cn: 婚外情确实会对婚姻造成毁灭性的影响。

sentences.en: An oil spill could be devastating for wildlife.
sentences.cn: 溢出的油对野生动物来说可能是毁灭性的。

sentences.en: I was devastating, if I do say so myself.
sentences.cn: 如果让我来说的话，我真是棒极了。

sentences.en: In the House of Commons the most devastating weapon is ridicule.
sentences.cn: 在下议院,最历害的武器就是嘲笑.

sentences.en: It is the most devastating storm in 20 years.
sentences.cn: 这是20年来破坏性最大的风暴.

sentences.en: It will be a devastating blow for the town if the factory closes.
sentences.cn: 如果工厂关闭，对该镇来说将是沉重的打击。

sentences.en: It's a devastating and barbaric act that defies all comprehension.
sentences.cn: 这种行为野蛮凶残、令人震惊，简直是不可理喻。

sentences.en: Just when it seemed life was going well, she was blindsided by a devastating illness.
sentences.cn: 正当生活似乎一帆风顺的时候，她出人意料地得了一场重病。

sentences.en: Opponents of the measure say it's political grandstanding that could prove devastating to the economy.
sentences.cn: 反对该措施的人士认为这是一场政治作秀，会对经济发展带来严重的打击。

sentences.en: She looks devastating in that skirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着那条裙子真好看.

sentences.en: The city of Ormac took the full force of the winds and devastating floods.
sentences.cn: 奥马克城受到了狂风和灾难性洪水的猛烈袭击。

sentences.en: The damage inflicted upon the British fleet was devastating.
sentences.cn: 英国舰队遭到了毁灭性的重创。

sentences.en: The diagnosis was devastating. She had cancer.
sentences.cn: 诊断结果令人震惊：她得了癌症。

sentences.en: The effect of unfavorable publicity on the regulated industry can be devastating.
sentences.cn: 对受管理工业的不利宣传的作用有可能带有极大的破坏性.

sentences.en: The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state.
sentences.cn: 那座火山在1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州大片地区。

trans.tran_cn: 毁灭性的，令人震惊的，给人印象深刻的
毁坏，使震惊（ devastate的现在分词）
